channel.title: Ash-vs-Evil-Dead on Schafe sind bessere Rasenmäher
channel.description: Recent content in Ash-vs-Evil-Dead on Schafe sind bessere Rasenmäher

item.title: Halloween is coming up
item.description: Preamble Every few years when halloween approaches I get the urge to (re)watch a whole bunch of scary movies. I’m not really picky so anything goes: slashers, elevated horror, ghost flicks, cosmic horror, … This year started out with a weird urge to rewatch all the Friday the 13th movies. I looked up the entire franchise and couldn’t remember if I had seen the latest reboot. I’m honestly still not quite sure, but I thiiiiink I’ve seen it once before, so this marks my second go through all of these horrible movies.
